title: Public transport for the A League Round 12: Saturday 4 January 2025
articleContent:
Experience the thrill of the 2024-25 A-League season at AAMI Park as Melbourne Victory takes on Western Sydney Wanderers.

We're running extra services to help you get to and from AAMI Park on Saturday 4 January.

The event starts at 7:35pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station

  • Ringwood leaving 9:41pm and 10:07pm from Platform 9
  • Glen Waverley leaving at 10:02pm from Platform 10
  • Frankston leaving at 9:51pm from Platform 4
  • Caulfield leaving at 9:58pm from Platform 4
  • Sandringham leaving 9:54pm from Platform 2

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70 trams run from Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

 Metropolitan bus

Catch a Route 246 bus close to the MCG.

Note: The last bus may run before the end of the match.

 Regional train

Normal trains leave from Southern Cross Station.
